In England, in the seven days to 04 April, there were 17,944 new confirmed cases (31.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 March, there were 29,791 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 40% (11,847 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 09 April is 3,815,779 (6,779.2 cases per 100,000 population).
